mapper.insert: insert into dcdg_basic_cate_base (CATE_ID, CATE_TYPE, CATE_NAME, CATE_IMG, CATE_PRICE, CATE_MONTH_NUM, SHOP_ID, CATE_STATUS, ADD_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{cateId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cateType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{cateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cateImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{cateMonthNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cateStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update dcdg_basic_cate_base set CATE_TYPE = #{cateType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CATE_NAME = #{cateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATE_IMG = #{cateImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATE_PRICE = #{catePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CATE_MONTH_NUM = #{cateMonthNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SHOP_ID = #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATE_STATUS = #{cateStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ADD_TIME = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where CATE_ID = #{cateId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select CATE_ID, CATE_TYPE, CATE_NAME, CATE_IMG, CATE_PRICE, CATE_MONTH_NUM, SHOP_ID, CATE_STATUS, ADD_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from dcdg_basic_cate_base where CATE_ID = #{cateId,jdbcType=CHAR}
select CATE_ID, CATE_TYPE, CATE_NAME, CATE_IMG, CATE_PRICE, CATE_MONTH_NUM, SHOP_ID, CATE_STATUS, ADD_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from dcdg_basic_cate_base
SELECT CATE_ID, CATE_TYPE, CATE_NAME, CATE_IMG, CATE_PRICE, CATE_MONTH_NUM, SHOP_ID from dcdg_basic_cate_base where CATE_STATUS = 1
